data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ hồi đáp lại cậu sau.
data.en_hint: I will get back to you later.
data.content_game_1: I will get back to you later.
data.answer_en_hint: I will get back to you later.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi không bao giờ dám cãi lại lời mẹ của chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: We never dare to answer back our mother.
data.content_game_1: We never dare to answer back our mother.
data.answer_en_hint: We never dare to answer back our mother.

data.trans_hint: Hãy cứ đi một mình đi - Tôi không chắc mình có thể trở về nhà đúng giờ đâu.
data.en_hint: Please go without me - I'm not sure I can get back to the house on time.
data.content_game_1: Please go without me - I'm not sure I can get back to the house on time.
data.answer_en_hint: Please go without me - I'm not sure I can get back to the house on time.

data.trans: Quay trở về trạng thái ban đầu
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã cố gắng ngủ tiếp sau khi tiễn anh ấy, nhưng tôi không thể.
data.en_hint: I tried to get back to sleep after seeing him off, but I couldn't.
data.content_game_1: I tried to get back to sleep after seeing him off, but I couldn't.
data.answer_en_hint: I tried to get back to sleep after seeing him off, but I couldn't.

data.trans_hint: Hãy thử dùng những chiếc ghim này để giữ tóc lại.
data.en_hint: Try using these pins to hold back your hair.
data.content_game_1: Try using these pins to hold back your hair.
data.answer_en_hint: Try using these pins to hold back your hair.

data.trans_hint: Khi nhìn lại cả một chặng đường dài, tôi đã ngạc nhiên khi thấy chúng ta trưởng thành như thế nào.
data.en_hint: Looking back on the whole journey, I was surprised at how much we grow.
data.content_game_1: Looking back on the whole journey, I was surprised at how much we grow.
data.answer_en_hint: Looking back on the whole journey, I was surprised at how much we grow.

data.trans_hint: Tôi phải đi ngay bây giờ, nhưng tôi sẽ gọi lại cho bạn trước bữa tối.
data.en_hint: I have to go right now, but I will phone you back by dinner.
data.content_game_1: I have to go right now, but I will phone you back by dinner.
data.answer_en_hint: I have to go right now, but I will phone you back by dinner.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi bạn sử dụng xong những vật liệu này, hãy cất chúng vào chỗ cũ giúp tôi nhé.
data.en_hint: After you finish with the materials, please help me put them back.
data.content_game_1: After you finish with the materials, please help me put them back.
data.answer_en_hint: After you finish with the materials, please help me put them back.

data.trans_hint: Tôi phải trả lại mấy chiếc quần áo này vì chúng không vừa với tôi.
data.en_hint: I have to send back these clothes because they don't fit me.
data.content_game_1: I have to send back these clothes because they don't fit me.
data.answer_en_hint: I have to send back these clothes because they don't fit me.
